instructions_html:
For each text fragment below, annotate each instance of the following categories:
* EYE: eye color
* HAIR: hair color, length, and/or style
* PERSON: personal name or alias
* COMPANY: company or business name
* ETHNIC: race, ethnicity, nationality, and/or skin tone
To annotate, first highlight by clicking/dragging the word or words which best detail the instance; then specify below the category for the instance.  Each group of highlighted words will use a different background color.

Examples:

Given: 

* Welcome to FUJIYAMA SPA !!!
* New Pretty Asian Cuties Waiting for YOU !!!
* Business Hours: 10am - 9pm ( 7 days a week
* Amazing Oriental Relaxing MASSAGE in FUJIYAMA SPA.
* Walk-ins Welcome or Call for an Appointment *416-299-5515*
 
* Location: McNicoll Ave Unit A8 Scarborough, ON
(North East corner plaza of McNicoll Ave & Middlefield Rd
SPA Facing Middlefield, on the Ground Floor of the 3 Storey Office Building

You would annotate

             FUJIYAMA SPA as COMPANY
	     Asian as ETHNIC
             FUJIYAMA SPA as COMPANY

Given:

Carly is a 27 year old Escort in Birmingham. She has straight blonde hair. She is available during the day and at night. 
 Don't forget to mention you saw her on NaughtyReviews!

You would annotate

    	  Carly as PERSON
	  straight blonde hair as HAIR

Given 

Now that Im 18 I can do ANYTHING I WANT! what do YOU want?.. - 18

You would annotate nothing.

Given

I'm Gillian, an ex-Ivy League activist who enjoys meeting and getting to know clients--conversational skills are a definite plus. I'm fun loving and adventurous, 5' 5", 130 lbs, with a D cup, 28 years old with blue eyes, black hair, and pale skin. I like to say I have a bit of a Snow White aesthetic. If you'll pardon the pun, my ass is my greatest asset. But the rest of my body is quite a prize too--and I can guarantee I'm all natural, no plastic surgery. 

I have a reputation for being wild, creative, and very safe--I enjoy using safe things at all times. ****I go into this with the understanding that neither you nor I would ever do ANYTHING illegal--but we'd have an amazing time together.**** I am a frisky girl, but I also enjoy just talking--about anything from politics to our personal lives to TV. Feel free to just relax with me. Or, we can play games and I can be a scary school mistress or a mean job interviewer. I like playing pretend.

My best friend, whom I dated in high school, is available for two women appointments with me. She is 27, with a lithe, trim, Audrey Hepburn like build, 5'3", 100 lbs, with a B cup, tan skin, long fawn colored hair, and green eyes. 

I REQUIRE a day's notice, so I can prepare to pamper you properly. (Say that 3 times fast.)(Very rarely, same day appts are available, but only w/ at least 3-4 hrs notice.) My hours are between 1 PM and midnightish. E-mail me at onlygillian@gmail.com, and I should get back to you within an hour--4-6 hours at most. (Please DON'T TEXT.) I much prefer e-mail to calls as we begin to get to know each other, but we will have a chance to talk on the phone before we meet. Half hour specials available 3/18.
You would annotate: Gillian as PERSON blue eyes as EYES black hair as HAIR pale skin as ETHNIC Audrey Hepburn as PERSON tan skin as ETHNIC long fawn colored hair as HAIR green eyes as EYES
description: Annotate eyes, hair, names, ethnicity in free text
title: Annotate eyes, hair, names, ethnicity in free text
keywords: classification, annotation, categorization, markup, natural language, identification
